```{=html}
<div class="center-text">
  <div class="typing-wrapper">
    <span class="typing-effect" aria-live="polite"></span><span class="cursor">|</span>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
const texts = [
  "Hi there! I'm Anna.",
  "Human-centered.",
  "Tech-curious.",
  "Nature-driven."
];

let index = 0;
let isErasing = false;
const typingSpeed = 100;
const erasingSpeed = 50;
const delayBetweenTexts = 2000;
const element = document.querySelector('.typing-effect');

function type() {
  const currentText = texts[index];
  const displayedText = element.textContent;

  if (!isErasing) {
    element.textContent = currentText.substring(0, displayedText.length + 1);
    if (displayedText.length + 1 === currentText.length) {
      isErasing = true;
      setTimeout(type, delayBetweenTexts);
    } else {
      setTimeout(type, typingSpeed);
    }
  } else {
    element.textContent = currentText.substring(0, displayedText.length - 1);
    if (displayedText.length === 0) {
      isErasing = false;
      index = (index + 1) % texts.length;
      setTimeout(type, typingSpeed);
    } else {
      setTimeout(type, erasingSpeed);
    }
  }
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  setTimeout(type, typingSpeed);
});
</script>

<div class="custom-footer">
  © 2025 Anna Zambo · <a href="Privacy Policy.html">Privacy Policy</a>
</div>

</div>

<style>
/* A teljes blokk vízszintesen középre */
.center-text {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-top: 4rem; /* finom felső távolság */
}

/* Gépelt szöveg stílusa */
.typing-wrapper {
  font-family: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.2rem;
  color:  #82CAFF;
  background-color: #111;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-align: center;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

/* Kurzor stílusa */
.cursor {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1.2rem;
  background-color:  #82CAFF;
  margin-left: 3px;
  animation: blink 1s steps(2, start) infinite;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

@keyframes blink {
  0%, 100% { opacity: 1; }
  50% { opacity: 0; }
}
</style>
```
